intro: Chrysanthemum junesarense, commonly known as the June chrysanthemum, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white to pale pink petals. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and thrives in well-drained soil with full sun exposure. It is often cultivated for ornamental purposes due to its vibrant blooms and is also used in traditional medicine. Chrysanthemum junesarense is a hardy perennial that blooms in late summer to early autumn.
